segments.text: I ’ d like to open a current account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . May I see your social security and your ID Please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here your are . I wonder how much interest can I earn for my current account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . Current account don ’ t pay our interest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s primarily design for business transactions . That is write checks to pay the bills , buying things and sending money . We won ’ t expect a large amount of deposit in current account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . How do I draw money from my news then .
segments.speaker: S1
